name: The Thousand Seasons Of Kyumori Episode1 HD
name_original: The Thousand Seasons Of Kyumori Episode1 HD
description:
A punch and a punch collide!!!
The most real 3D collision judging in the 3D fighting games on the iOS!!!
The vs fighting game only by flick!!! It's the easiest operation on the iOS!
On the communication battle, let's experience reality that a punch and a punch collide!!!

・Hilights
- The unique characters which have not been once in fighting games.
- The leading real 3D collision judging in iOS 3D fighting games. A punch and a punch collide in the 3D space.
- The flowing clouds. The grasses and flowers which trembles in the wind.
- Three-dimensional characters by a new lighting and a real-time shading process.
- Local communication battles are possible between iPhones, iPodTouches or iPads.
- Three kinds of UIs are possible to be used. Only flick operation is also possible.
- In the watch mode, a computer plays battles automatically.
- Various config setups. It's possible to change freely the position and the size of a controller and buttons.

・Hilights of the HD version
- You can play this on both the landscape screen and the portrait screen!!
- You can adjust the size of the controller separately on the landscape screen and the portrait screen!!
- You can change many beautiful stands on the portrait screen!!
- You can set the controller outside the game screen on the portrait screen!!
